location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 35/31 'Bahrain: application for W/T amateur transmitting licence for employee of Bahrain Petroleum Company'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 125; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file concerns the application by a British subject in Bahrain for the issue of an amateur wireless transmitting license, and the allotment of a wireless call sign.The file contains a booklet 'A guide to Amateur Radio' (folios 40-123), by Radio Society of Great Britain.The file contains correspondence between the Radio Society of Great Britain, the India Office, the Foreign Office, the Admiralty, the Air Ministry, the Political Residency in the Persian Gulf, the Political Agency at Bahrain.
